name: You are dead!
desc:
ğŸ¦† Tweet this attempt to appear in credits.
âœ‹ Grab your soul to give it another try.

name: You are sleeping.
desc:
You are dreaming of an endless road.
Continue forward using ğŸ‘£ Walk

name: Internal Demon
desc:
Enemies fight back if they have ğŸŸ¢ Energy.
ğŸ›¡ Block or ğŸŒ€ Roll before ğŸ¯ Attacking.

name: You dream of a shrimp.
desc:
ğŸ– Grab any food and loot you encounter.
ğŸ’¤ Rest regularly to regain ğŸŸ¢ Energy.

name: Decide who you are.
desc:
Tailor your own experience.
Choose a character perk.

name: You are waking up.
desc:
There is nothing but trees all around.
ğŸ‘£ Walk to explore further ahead.

name: Spiky Hedgehog
desc:
At first it looked like a stone.
Then it started moving.

name: Fern Glade
desc:
This looks like a nice place to rest.
You should make use of it.

name: Stray Dog
desc:
It is looks kind of aggressive.
Try exhausting it and then petting it.

name: Abandoned Tent
desc:
Nice and cozy place to rest.
You could use a break.

name: Lost Map
desc:
You stumbled upon an old map.
There are some notes around the edges.
message: You enhanced your awareness

name: Roasted Chicken
desc:
It is still hot and untouched.
Who would leave it like that?

name: Forest Person
desc:
Did you just poke around my camp?
You should better have a good reason.

name: Pine Tree
desc:
Another tree in a forest.
You never noticed it before.

name: Engaging Owl
desc:
It stares at you without blinking an eye.
Almost feels like it's about to speak.
message: It revealed you a powerful secret

name: Mangy Bear
desc:
It appears to be very upset.
Beware its mighty attack.
message: You were torn to pieces

name: Eternal Flame
desc:
Strange warmth fills your soul.
As if this was a special place.

name: Dire Rat
desc:
It jumped out of nowhere really fast.
Better raise your shield.

name: Rabid Raccoon
desc:
Cute on the outside.
Corrupted inside

name: Sweet Honeypot
desc:
Yum. This would finely refresh you.
You wonder where it came from.
message: The honeypot was filled with bees.

name: Swarm of Bees
desc:
The bees totally surrounded you.
Blocking seems like the best option.

name: Sharp Axe
desc:
The owner could be nearby.
I'd rather not mess with it.
message: You took it to use it as a weapon

name: Alpha Boar
desc:
Its loud stomps follow you around.
You'd better dodge its attacks.

name: Boar Meat
desc:
Hmm. Maybe you could make use of it.
Sadly there's no fire around.
message: The raw meat made you sick

name: Forest Skunk
desc:
This one is fast and stinky.
You cannot avoid its attacks.

name: Suspicious Mushroom
desc:
You don't recognise this species.
Could it be poisonous?
message: Eating it made you more resilient

name: Overgrown Reeds
desc:
This seems like the only way forward.
But anything could be hiding there.

name: Frog-faced Giant
desc:
*notices your presence*
*prepares to strike*

name: Glowing Pond
desc:
The water has a strange glow.
You wonder what's at the bottom.

name: Shiny Trinket
desc:
The surface has a pearlescent finish.
You feel its sinister aura.

name: Eternal Flame
desc:
Strange warmth fills your soul.
As if this was a special place.

name: Irritable Goat
desc:
It looks bursting with anger.
Better avoid it's attacks.

name: Rose Flower Bush
desc:
These are just beautiful.
You should grab some.
message: Ouch! It has a lot of thorns

name: Cunning Fox
desc:
It came to sit right in front of you.
Perhaps it's up to something.

name: Familiar Plant
desc:
You noticed a distinctive plant nearby.
Could it be something edible?
message: You dug it out of the ground.

name: Wild Carrot
desc:
A carrot was hiding below the ground.
This seems like a time for a snack.

name: Mighty Deer
desc:
Huge deer jumped out of the bush.
Better be very careful.

name: Cursed Bow
desc:
It lays besides a dead hunter body.
He probably won't miss it.
message: You shot yourself by a mistake

name: Apple Tree
desc:
A fruit tree in a forest.
Who would have thought.

name: Ripe Apple
desc:
It looks extra shiny and tasty.
You might recover some lost health.

name: Honey Badger
desc:
It looks fairly angry over your presence.
Make sure to dodge its furious attacks.

name: Four-leaf Clover
desc:
You noticed some interesting growth.
Maybe it could bring you luck.

name: Picnic Basket
desc:
Someone must have lost it here.
Maybe there is still something inside

name: Cinnamon Cookie
desc:
You wonder who could have lost it.
It looks unspoiled and tasty.

name: Old Wolf
desc:
It walks slowly towards you.
Hopefully it's not hungry.

name: Cavern Entrance
desc:
You wonder whats in there.
Maybe some treasure?

name: Eternal Flame
desc:
Strange warmth fills your soul.
As if this was a special place.

name: Invisible Creature
desc:
You feel something crawling around.
It seems to be fast as a wind.
message: They ripped you apart

name: Pile of Bones
desc:
You stumbled over someone's remains.
This doesn't look like an accident.

name: Ghostly Wolf
desc:
Its winding up for a powerful attack.
You should better avoid it.
message: They ripped you apart

name: Pile of Skulls
desc:
A lot of adventures ended here.
Better stay alert!

name: Golden Trinket
desc:
You feel like picking it up.
It's almost irresistable.

name: Invisible Creature
desc:
Something is crawling around again.
What is happening here?
message: They ripped you apart

name: Tired Old Man
desc:
The silhouette changed to a human.
They are willing to enchant you.
message: They ripped you apart

name: Ancient Scroll
desc:
Some say these will make you blind.
There's only one way to find out.
message: You absorbed some elder power

name: Unknown Potion
desc:
It is glowing in the dark.
You probably shouldn't drink it.
message: It left a funny taste in your mouth

name: Mythical Snake
desc:
It perfectly blends with the surroundings.
You almost stumbled over it.

name: Snake Egg
desc:
You wonder how it tastes.
There's only one way to find out.

name: Strange Door
desc:
You discovered some ornate door.
Where could it lead to?

name: Giant Web
desc:
Hopefully nobody's home.
It seems quite sturdy.
message: Eww it's gross having webs on you

name: Eight-legged Menace
desc:
It looks like it was waiting for a prey.
There is no turning back now.

name: Eternal Flame
desc:
Strange warmth fills your soul.
As if this was a special place.

name: Faded Amphora
desc:
Strange warmth fills your soul.
As if this was a special place.

name: Evil Genie
desc:
How dare you disturb me?
Prepare to die!

name: Screaming Bat
desc:
Its scream echoes around the crypt.
You got goosebumps.

name: Desolate Gave
desc:
The text is all faded.
Something is on the ground.
message: You dug out some shiny ring.

name: Engagement Ring
desc:
It could still warm someone's heart.
Or at least fill their pocket.
message: You felt a surge in your chest

name: Animated Dead
desc:
It surely carries lot of diseases.
You'd better keep your distance.

name: Engraved Ring
desc:
It says "My Precious" on the inside.
That sounds promising.
message: Ouch! The ring is too tight

name: Spooky Spirit
desc:
A ghost appeared out of nowhere.
A little bit scary in this darkness.

name: Old Potato
desc:
It looks suspiciously too fresh.
Maybe it was brought here recently.

name: Thirsty Vampire
desc:
It seems to have just awoken.
Better avoid its fangs.

name: The Scales of Honor
desc:
You've heard about it before.
It's the final trial.

name: Massive Dragon
desc:
Dude! Is this the final challenge?
You surely must take it down.
message: Their flame burned you alive

name: King's Crown
desc:
This is where it ends for now.
Tweet your adventure to appear in credits!
